content: F-BT-MR SN Threaded studs with sealing washer Stainless steel threaded studs for use with Hilti Stud Fusion, including sealing washer and safety flange nut ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features Complete fastening point solution including sealing washer for corrosion protection and safety flange nut for more reliable threaded connection Corrosion Resistance Class III – high-performance stainless steel welded threaded studs Little-to-no rework necessary on back of coated steel – corrosion protection remains intact Portable, cordless system – eliminates the need for long power supply cords Ultimate productivity – ideal for fastening directly to coated steel Applications Fastening to coated steel in polluted/corrosive environments (up to C5) for higher tensile loads or thinner base materials. Suitable for Hilti Stud Fusion tooling only Steel fastening in oil and gas offshore installations – cable tray/ladder supports, pipe supports, multi-disciplinary supports and miscellaneous equipment fastenings Steel fastening in oil and gas onshore installations – cable tray/ladder supports, non-critical pipe supports, multi-disciplinary supports and miscellaneous equipment fastenings Shipbuilding – block alignment, fastening false ceilings, raised floors, inspection grids and manholes, water spray separators; fastening of internal and external furniture and outfitting (lamps, switches, junction boxes etc.); support for electric/piping/ventilation services For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Carbon steel Corrosion protection: Stainless steel A5 Environmental Conditions: Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution Technical Data | Base materials | Carbon steel | Corrosion protection | Stainless steel A5 | Environmental Conditions | Outdoor, areas with heavy industrial pollution | Material | Stainless steel A5 | Point type | Blunt tip | For use with (tools) | FX 3-A | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2293881 -
